name: Fifth Element
description: Opening raidwide magical damage.

name: Serpent Descending
description: Multi-hit party damage as serpent clones descend in lines. Moderate raidwide pulses while resolving early mechanics.

name: Onmyo Sigil
description: Targeted sigil AoEs that hit marked players hard. Handle patterns to reduce hits.

name: Infirm Soul
description: Heavy single-target tankbuster. Use strong mitigation or invuln.

name: Karmic Curse
description: Low magical damage to all players in a rapid sequence; applies debuffs/DoT. Healers be ready for follow-up.

name: Blue Bolt + Red Rush
description: Large magical hits on all players (Blue Bolt) with two smaller line dashes (Red Rush). Spread/position to minimize overlaps.

name: Iwa-no-shiki Kanab≈ç
description: Very heavy physical tankbuster from add. Tank swap or invuln recommended.

name: Doro-no-shiki Explosions
description: Series of ground explosions from mud sigils. Multiple small magical hits while resolving the pattern.

name: Numa-no-shiki Explosion
description: Large magical hits from swamp sigils; heavier than Doro-no-shiki.

name: Doro-no-shiki Explosions
description: Further pulses of ground explosions while finishing the sigil phase.

name: Numa + Doro Explosions
description: Mixed heavy and light explosions in quick succession. Consider party mitigation with spot healing.

name: Dragon's Wake
description: High raidwide magical damage following add/transition.

name: Coursing River
description: Line AoEs that sweep the arena, dealing moderate magical damage to all.

name: Great Typhoon
description: Knockback and light damage. Position to avoid being pushed into hazards.

name: Fifth Element
description: Raidwide magical damage.

name: Yama-no-shiki Handprint
description: Targeted heavy hit on marked players. Assign soaks/defensives as needed.

name: Force of Nature
description: Very low incidental magical damage ticks to all players.

name: Coursing River
description: Another sweep of line AoEs across the arena.

name: Forbidden Arts (set 1)
description: Series of moderate-to-high magical hits in quick succession. Chain mitigation and healing.

name: Onmyo Sigil
description: Targeted sigil AoEs; ensure safe resolutions to minimize hits.

name: Fifth Element
description: Raidwide magical damage as the fight loops.

name: Serpent Descending
description: Multi-hit party damage while resolving serpent patterns.

name: Serpent's Fang
description: Light magical bleeds/marks on several players following Descending.

name: Forbidden Arts (set 2)
description: Another sequence of magical hits in short intervals. Rotate party mitigation.

name: Fifth Element
description: Raidwide magical damage.

name: Infirm Soul
description: Heavy tankbuster; healers prepare for follow-up Karmic Curse ticks.

name: Karmic Curse
description: Low multi-hit magical damage to all players.

name: Infirm Soul
description: Second tankbuster in this loop.

name: Karmic Curse
description: Follow-up low raidwide ticks.

description: More targeted sigil AoEs.

description: Very low ticks followed by moderate line AoEs.

name: Force of Nature + Coursing River
description: Repeat of low ticks into sweeping lines.

description: Burst sequence of magical hits; healers plan AoE heals.
